metadata.name: Converge (00)
metadata.description:
Converge (00)  is an animation based on the exploration of biomorphic forms suggesting states of transformation and mutation. The biomorphic abstractions allude to body parts, vast landscapes to microscopic forms. Converge (00))  draws connections between the internal/external, organic/synthetic, and real/dream.

4K file available to the collector + digital ultrachrome ink print 18"
